create_time.description: Time the Mesh was created in UTC.

description.description: A free-text description of the resource. Max length 1024 characters.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

interception_port.description: Optional. If set to a valid TCP port (1-65535), instructs the SIDECAR proxy to listen on the specified port of localhost (127.0.0.1) address. The SIDECAR proxy will expect all traffic to be redirected to this port regardless of its actual ip:port destination. If unset, a port '15001' is used as the interception port. This will is applicable only for sidecar proxy deployments.

labels.description: Set of label tags associated with the Mesh resource. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: Location (region) of the Mesh resource to be created. Only the value 'global' is currently allowed; defaults to 'global' if omitted.

name.description: Short name of the Mesh resource to be created.

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

update_time.description: Time the Mesh was updated in UTC.
